thread.title: Barcelona kid Jordi Mboula scores incredible solo goal | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Barcelona kid Jordi Mboula scores incredible solo goal | Daily Mail Online

author: James Dutton For Mailonline
title: Barcelona kid Jordi Mboula scores incredible solo goal | Daily Mail Online
text:
Share this article Share Picking up the ball on the halfway line, he shows off some fancy footwork to send his opposite number the wrong way. After losing his marker he then sprints down the byline and approaches the penalty area, where he is stopped in his track by two more defenders. Instead of looking to shift the ball inside or find a team-mate, he backs his own ability. 
La cadencia de Leo Messi, el regate de Neymar Jr. y la potencia de Luis Suarez, Â¡en uno solo! ðŸ˜® ðŸ˜® ðŸ˜® Posted by Goal.com AmÃ©ricas on Wednesday, February 22, 2017 As he continued into the penalty area he was confronted by two defenders But he managed to jink his way in between both of their challenges and through on goal A close-up replay shows the incredible skill he used to dissect their challenges After bursting through he showed great composure to plant the ball in the bottom corner He sends both defenders the wrong way with another quick bit of skill, and dissects their challenges to burst through into the penalty area. Now with only the goalkeeper to beat he finishes in style, planting his shot into the far bottom corner beyond the grasp of the goalkeeper. As he wheels away in celebration of a majestic goal, the starlet is mobbed by his team-mates, each as gobsmacked as the rest of the stadium at what they've just witnessed. The 17-year-old found the bottom corner with aplomb after beating Dortmund on his own The youngster wheels away in celebration after scoring his incredible solo goal He has mobbed by his Barcelona team-mates in the corner flag after his strike Share or comment on this article 6
